abstract: You can get results from another search engine with a quick visit to the browser’s settings.
snippet: You can get results from another search engine with a quick visit to the browser’s settings.
lead_paragraph: Q. When I type in web searches in the box at the top of the Safari program on my Mac, the browser always brings me Google results. Is there a way to use Bing without having to first go to the Bing page and then type in keywords?

headline.main: Change Safari’s Search Engine Under the Hood
